features: New, transparent formula made with bio-based ingredients, fragranced in Isle to infuse laundry with fresh, coastal-inspired scent.
Exceptional all-purpose detergent formulated to improve cleaning and target stains with an enzyme complex tough on fresh and set in stains, dirt, and oil​.
Specially formulated for whites and colors and suitable for all machines and water temperatures​.
Scented in Isle, a dewy, luminous infusion of fresh basil, mint, lime, and watery notes, anchored with the warm aromas of heliotrope, jasmine, and sandalwood.
New lightweight consistency for less messy dosing. Designed to pair with our Laundry Measuring Cup for easy dosing (not included). 32 FL OZ (1 QT) 946 mL​
body.description: Transform your everyday laundry routine into a task that’s anything but ordinary with the escapist scent of The Laundress Signature Detergent Isle. Our high-performing laundry formula is our most exceptional everyday detergent for everything from shirts to sheets. Optimized for cool water and suitable for HE machines, Signature Detergent Isle is an all-purpose laundering formula that helps remove stubborn dirt, stains, and grease for a beautiful clean in just one wash. Specially formulated for whites and colors, with powerful, deep-cleaning enzymes that target fresh and set in stains. Elevate your laundry routine with Isle and discover wanderlust with every wash. Scented in Isle, a dewy, luminous infusion of fresh basil, mint, lime, and watery notes, anchored with the warm aromas of heliotrope, jasmine, and sandalwood. Fresh news for Fresh Wash fans: Our limited-edition Fresh Wash detergent scent was so popular, we gave it a makeover and made it a permanent part of our collection as Isle! Enjoy the same sophisticated scent you love, with a new name and packaging to match.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Glad they're finally back
reviews.reviewText: Doesn't have the exploding smell as before but still smells nice and does the job well! Glad they're back

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fabulous and worth the money
reviews.reviewText: This smell is AMAZING! I add a capfu or two to a spray bottle with water to refresh my linens, pillows, rugs, couches and throws. The fragrance is very clean, fresh and earthy, appeal is very unisex. It is a bit pricey but worth every cent. I just put 1-2 capfuls with my ordinary laundry detergent to give it that boost of a lingering fragrance I can smell all day! Buy it, you won’t regret it, I promise.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Smell does not linger
reviews.reviewText: This detergent smells amazing but I am saddened that the smell does not linger. by the time I am done drying my clothes, they smell like nothing. I use this with the silicone cup.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best for beding
reviews.reviewText: Superior product for care of sheetsCleans thoroughly with lite fresh scent

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE this product!
reviews.reviewText: It's a bit pricey but, a little (1oz) does a load! The scent is wonderful. I just purchased another one!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Where is the scent?
reviews.reviewText: I thought I would try this product to use on my delicates and bedding. I like a detergent with a wonderful scent. Personally, for me this was a waste of money as this has almost no scent whatsoever. I even increased the amount per wash to see if that might help but it didn't. I will stick with my favorites: Capri Blue Volcano & Tyler Glamour Wash (Diva and High Maintenance scents).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Bring back Laundress No. 10
reviews.reviewText: This is their new “updated” formula which is nowhere near as good as the original. The worst part is they don’t offer the very best products they used to make like their laundry Detergent No. 10. It was the absolute best. Now their scents are much more bland and nowhere near what the products used to be like. I wish the founder never sold to P&G, all they’ve done is ruin a great, valuable brand.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: No measuring cup so I probably used way more than I needed to each time, but liked the scent.
